content: *just added a pattern for a women s small* 60-65m 80-90m of aran weight yarn so if you are doubling a sport weight and lace weight will need 80-90m of each *can make a larger size medium-large by switching to 4 5mm **or** adding two stitches in the round cast on 34/increase up to 52/38 after casting off thumb and edging towards the higher suggested number of crochet stitches when tidying the thumb
